title: Seth Meyers Reimagines 'Friends' Episode Titles In The Time Of Trump
text:
What if “Friends” came back in the time of President Donald Trump?

To mark the show’s 25th anniversary, “Late Night” host Seth Meyers on Tuesday imagined what its episode titles would be if the hit series returned in 2019.

Such as, “The one where everyone finds out Joey voted for Trump.”

Check out the clip above.

description: "The one where everyone finds out Joey voted for Trump."
